articles.author: Chris Boccia, Anne Flaherty
articles.title: Several US military bases in Europe put on heightened state of alert, US officials say - ABC News
articles.description: The alert level of Force Protection Condition "Charlie" has been put in place.
articles.content:
Several U.S. military bases across Europe are now operating under a heightened state of alert, ABC News has confirmed.
The alert level of Force Protection Condition (FPCON) "Charlie" was put in plac… [+646 chars]

articles.content: Jude Bellingham rescued England from crashing out of Euro 2024 against Slovakia on Sunday with a stunning 95th-minute equaliser before Harry Kane's early extra-time winner sent the sub-par pre-tourna… [+1615 chars]

articles.author: Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: Le Pen's far right set for big win in first round of French election - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Early projections show National Rally on course for victory in the vote for a new parliament as Emmanuel Macron’s election gamble backfires.
articles.content: The French people have shown that they want to draw a line under seven years of [Macrons] disdainful rule, said Le Pen, speaking at a party event in the Eastern French town of Hénin-Beaumont. We have… [+1184 chars]
